name: LD 51 Pixel Defence
description:
A tower defense game where you have to protect you main base block from waves that increase every 10 seconds. build defenses, attackers and money generating towers or mix and match.

As you build towers they get more health from the bottom up, but you can only build so high.

select the block you want to build from the menu, and build on the ground.

Housing - generates money
Attack - attacks enemies
Defense - stops enemies for awhile

This “Game” was made in about 20 hours in total.
